sentences.en: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.cn: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

sentences.en: A positive pregnancy test soon confirmed her intuitive feelings.
sentences.cn: 阳性孕检结果很快证实了她的直觉。

sentences.en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself.
sentences.cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

sentences.en: As soon as relations improve they will be allowed to go.
sentences.cn: 一旦关系有所改善，他们就可以获准离开。

sentences.en: As soon as the two chicks hatch, they leave the nest burrow.
sentences.cn: 两只小鸟一出壳就离开了巢穴。

sentences.en: As soon as we were inside, the rain began to bucket down.
sentences.cn: 我们刚进屋，大雨便倾盆而下。

sentences.en: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.cn: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.en: Dorothy, come on. Never mind your shoes. They'll soon dry off.
sentences.cn: 快点儿吧，多萝西。别去管你的鞋子了，它们很快就会干的。

sentences.en: He was soon one of the most celebrated young painters in England.
sentences.cn: 不久他就成了英格兰最负盛名的年轻画家之一。

sentences.en: He would soon launch a second offensive, killing off the peace process.
sentences.cn: 他不久将会再次发动进攻，彻底毁掉整个和平进程。

sentences.en: I would be grateful if you would come to your senses sooner rather than later.
sentences.cn: 你要是能早点恢复理智我就谢天谢地了。

sentences.en: If you don't do it soon you're going to lose the opportunity.
sentences.cn: 不赶紧行动就没机会了。

sentences.en: It will be dark soon.
sentences.cn: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.en: Its headquarters will soon be relocated from Westminster to the Greenwich site.
sentences.cn: 其总部很快将从威斯敏斯特迁往格林尼治。

sentences.en: No sooner was the frost off the ground than the work began.
sentences.cn: 地上的霜一消散，人们就开始工作了

sentences.en: she had no sooner spoken than the telephone rang.
sentences.cn: 她刚一说话，电话就响了。

sentences.en: She is expected soon to hand down a ruling.
sentences.cn: 估计她很快会宣布裁决结果。

sentences.en: Sooner or later you will have to face the facts.
sentences.cn: 你迟早将面对事实

sentences.en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
sentences.cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

sentences.en: Their affection for her soon increased almost to idolatry.
sentences.cn: 他们对她的喜爱不久就发展到了盲目崇拜的地步。

sentences.en: They stopped you as soon as you deviated from the script.
sentences.cn: 一旦你偏离了剧本的内容，他们就会喊停。

sentences.en: Would you call me as soon as you find out?
sentences.cn: 你一弄清楚了就给我打电话好吗？

phrases.tran_cn: 多久；多快；多少时间之后
再见；待会儿见；希望尽快见到你
很快你就将知道；不久 你将看到

trans.tran_en: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens
